bibl.title: Callimachus and His Koinai. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: Surveys the various linguistic registers that might be expected between the actual koine Greek, as exemplified in the documentary papyri, and the 'poetic koine'. - Koine. - Dialects. - Poetic Koine? - Koine and Poetry.
bibl.seg: Parsons Peter, Callimachus and His Koinai. Avec résumé en anglais.
Benjamin Acosta-Hughes, Luigi Lehnus and Susan Stephens (Edd.), Brill's Companion to Callimachus (Leiden - Boston, 2011) pp. 134-152.

Surveys the various linguistic registers that might be expected between the actual koine Greek, as exemplified in the documentary papyri, and the 'poetic koine'. - Koine. - Dialects. - Poetic Koine? - Koine and Poetry.
